page.title: 08DOWTY BOULTON PAUL
page.content: Dowty Boulton Paul is situated near Bilbrook ,on the Shropshire Union canal.The factory was built between 1934-1937.It was probably built by William Wilcox.Dowty is in the Hydraulic Power business.They make the flying controls that are in the rudders and elevators in aircraft. They also make parts for ships.Their materials come from many places all over the world.Things are bought ready made to fit on Dowty parts.Their products are sent all over the world;to China for the VC10 aircraft,and also to Germany,Italy and France.Dowty employs 1047 people with an intake of 47 new employees per year.They have no plans for expansion in the future.Their work is very important to the Government
